scripts.build:optimized: npm run build && npm run optimize:all
scripts.size:check: du -sh dist/ && find dist/ -type f -name '*.js' -o -name '*.css' -o -name '*.html' | head -10 | xargs du -h | sort -hr
scripts.perf:analyze: npm run build && npm run size:check && echo '\nðŸ“Š Performance Analysis:' && echo 'Target: Bundle <500KB, CSS <30KB, HTML <100KB'
scripts.perf:optimize: npm run build && find dist/ -name '._*' -delete && node scripts/safe-html-optimize.js && node scripts/performance-dashboard.js
